item-link-tree.CHARGES_HINT: If this item will be cast using charges from the parent item, configure the number of charges above.
item-link-tree.LIMITED_HINT: If this item has a number of uses per rest or similar innate limitations, configure the number of charges above.
item-link-tree.MISSING_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: This item's original item could not be found. Maybe it was deleted?
item-link-tree.QUERY_ALSO_DELETE: Would you also like to delete the items from that item?
item-link-tree.SAVE_HINT: If this item has a flat DC or other specialized saving throw logic.
item-link-tree.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.H: Select which item types can have items attached.
item-link-tree.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.HINT: If checked, itembook sections added by this module will be put at the bottom of the itembook tab, rather than the top.
item-link-tree.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.NAME: itembook Sort Order
item-link-tree.item_LEVEL_HINT: If this item is to be cast at a specific level, configure the level above.
item-link-tree.WARN_ALSO_DELETE: This will delete the leaf item from the current item. Are you certain you want to delete the leaf item?
item-link-tree.WARN_CANNOT_ADDREMOVE: An Owned Item's items cannot be added to or removed from. These items have been added to the Actor's itembook Tab.
item-link-tree.WARN_OWNED: You are editing an owned Item's items, any changes made here will not be applied to the items on the owning actor.

item-link-tree.subType.label: Sub Type
item-link-tree.prefix.label: Prefix
item-link-tree.suffix.label: Suffix
item-link-tree.SETTINGS.GM_ONLY.NAME: Only GM can see and edit the 'Leafs' tab
item-link-tree.SETTINGS.GM_ONLY.TITLE: If enable only the GM can see and edit the 'Leafs' Tab
item-link-tree.SETTINGS.GM_ONLY.HINT: If enable only the GM can see and edit the 'Leafs' Tab
item-link-tree.SETTINGS.PLAYER_CAN_ONLY_: Players can see but not edit the 'Leafs' tab
[YOU MUST DISABLE THE SETTING 'Only GM can see and edit the 'Leafs' tab'] If enable players can see but not edit the 'Leafs' Tab
[YOU MUST DISABLE THE SETTING 'Only GM can see and edit the 'Leafs' tab'] If enable players can see but not edit 'Leafs' Tab
item-link-tree.isLeaf.label: Is Leaf ?
item-link-tree.isLeafHint.label: A boolean value useful for filter the items with a leaf integration, is not mandatory, but advisable to set
item-link-tree.showImageIcon.label: Show Image Icon ?
item-link-tree.showImageIconHint.label: If enable it will show the icon image of this leaf on the invetory list of the actor sheet
item-link-tree.transferEffect.label: Transfer Effect ?
item-link-tree.transferEffectHint.label: Do you want to transfer effect to the parent item when added ?
item-link-tree.transferBonus.label: Transfer BAB Bonus ?
item-link-tree.transferBonusHint.label: Do you want to transfer bonus to the parent item when added ?
item-link-tree.shortDescription.label: Short Description
item-link-tree.dialog.warning.areyousure: Are you sure you want to add the object ?
The object (usually a gem) will be destroyed when the operation is completed, so be careful adventurer.
item-link-tree.gem.label: Gem
item-link-tree.leaf.label: Leaf
item-link-tree.filterItemType.label: Select an array of items for which you want the leaf applied separated by the ',' character (e.g. weapon, equipment, consumable, tool, loot, background, class, subclass, spell, feat, backpack). if empty all tiem types are applied.
item-link-tree.settings.customItemTabNam: Set a custom title for the tab item
Set a custom title for the tab item
item-link-tree.settings.selectableSubtyp: The subtypes to show to the the select on the sheet.
The syntax for this is setting is avalue|alabel,bvalue|blabel, where every element separated from , is a option on the select subtype
item-link-tree.settings.canAddLeafOnlyIf: Can add leaf only to crafted items
ONLY WITH THE MODULE 'beavers-crafting' present and active. The leaf will not be added if the element is not crafted.
Can add leaf only to linked items
ONLY WITH THE MODULE 'item-linking' present and active. The leaf will not be added if the element is not linked.
